## SwivelMetaServices.addUserActivitiesListener() method

Add the listener for the user's activities. Like when the user enters the scene or leaves the scene.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addUserActivitiesListener(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
